1.1.name: wordpress/featured-posts-with-multiple-custom-groups-fpmcg
1.1.description: This plugin allows you to create unlimited custom groups of featured posts. Admin can create unlimited groups and assign the posts under one or multiple groups. The widget section allows the admin to show these groups of featured posts. The widget section is hugely customizable to enter HTML and CSS to give the featured posts blocks the desired look. Please refer to the help section in plugin settings page for more details.
